tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Ideologically charged. Full-blown social justice warrior. Literally has a clause in her syllabus that allows her to lower your overall mark if you disagrees with you or if she deems to to be "rude or aggressive". AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Brutal course that requires you to be at every single class unless you want to miss 5+ pages of notes. Grades harshly and doesn\'t have a clear expectations. No powerpoint, boring lectures, and all around a course I would recommend people to avoid. Very sensitive to people being late and will call you out if she feels like it.

stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Very boring. When you don\'t agree with her, you fail! She does not have any consistency. TO AVOID!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Very boring and heavy lectures. She never repeats what she says, she just goes on and on for an hour and a half and you have to follow as best as you can. If you think you can skip class, forget it, you will miss 20 pages of notes and nothing is put on blackboard. However, if you like talking about the world wars and its issues, its a class for you

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The lectures could be a little more exciting, but the content is pretty straightforward and the assignments are short and easy for a history class. As long as you study, getting an A should be no problem.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: The lectures are a little dull, but I did like her approach to European History. Was a little annoyed that our exam question was What is Europe? But if that is your sort of thing. Readings are not really mandatory, and classes mostly are. Very sweet and definitely helpful outside of class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Great professor, if you read the texts and pay attention to what she says, you will pass her tests and midterms. I really enjoy listening to her, she approaches this subject from a critical and social perspective rather than just political. She provides good context and really good feedback.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: her marking for me was a little inexplicable, I was not a fan of her lecture style nor her arrangement of the course structure, however that is my opinion

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is such an awesome teacher. Lectures are always interesting. I would fall asleep sometimes, but only because because I commute and wake up at 4:30 every morning, NOT because she is dull. And for those of you whining about no/not enough slides, get over it!! You\'re adults now, learn to take notes. Highly recommend this prof.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Absolutely fabulous. Prof. Davidson is the best prof I\'ve had this semester. She\'s engaging and extremely knowledgeable. Her material is interesting and goes way beyond information you may have picked up along the way. Her exams are fair and the topic for the paper was really unique. I\'ll look for her in the future!

comments: Very dull and boring professor. Slides would be helpful to peak some interest. She\'s not very enthusiastic, which makes it very hard not to get side-tracked.

comments: I loved this class! Really interesting material and well organised. Highly recommend her and the class.

comments: I was very interested in this subject before entering the class, but unfortunately she is not very engaging and manages to make the subject quite boring. Would definitely not reccomend.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: If you are not in second year this class is a joke, repetitive and boring. Her use of her french accent was utterly annoying. And nothing I learned was new. This class is a bird course if you are in 4th year. She was not an engaging prof and if you want a good nap sign up for this class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Very knowledgeable and interesting. She wants the class to participate and is very open to comments and questions. There are no overheads and so be prepared to go to class and take lots of notes. Grading is fair and work is interesting. Good class!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Excellent teacher if you like to be challenged. Constantly asking the class of 50+ questions to maximize participation. Imaginative assignments that made me think, instead of the usual regurgitaton. Highly recommended.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Excellent prof. Went the extra mile to make the subject matter interesting. Readings are not really that important, but are nevertheless quite interesting. Would definitely recommend.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  LECTURE HEAVY (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Great prof, really liked her, knew her stuff. Downside was there wasn\'t much about battles and war for a Europe - post 1945 class, but the social aspects we focused on were extremely interesting. Lots of reading, but it didn\'t matter that I didn\'t really do it, still got an A, very very helpful too! take a class with her!
